page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: In this area there are two churches and two chapels. The two churches are Anglican churches and are in Rhydymwyn and Rhosesmor. One of the chapels has closed down and the other one is a chapel for Welsh people. Both churches have two services every Sunday but the Welsh chapel has only one. Most of the people in the area don't go to church. The people who do go are mostly old people (over 60 years of age) and young children (under 10 years of age). The children who go to church go to Sunday School but their parents never go to church. Most people spend their Sundays at home in the garden or go for a day out. They think that going to church is a waste of time.
